articles.title: 'Typographic attack': pen and paper fool AI into thinking apple is an iPod - The Guardian
articles.description: OpenAI’s Clip system fails to correctly decipher images when words are pasted on picture
articles.content: As artificial intelligence systems go, it is pretty smart: show Clip a picture of an apple and it can recognise that it is looking at a fruit. It can even tell you which one, and sometimes go as far … [+3579 chars]
